About.p1: I am a Node.js, Java, and Python software developer with over 1 year of experience in web development. I am a dedicated, studious professional, always eager to learn and grow, ready to face any challenge, and contribute effective solutions for the success of the team.
About.p2: I am currently focused on backend development and work with the following technologies:
About.p3: Node.js (Javascript/Typescript) | Framework Express/Nestjs/Fastify | Java Spring Python (Pandas, Django) | SQL, relational databases (Postgres, MySql, and SQLServer) and non-relational databases (Redis, MongoDB) | Unit and integration testing with Node.js and Java | Knowledge of microservices, design patterns, DDD, and Clean Code (SOLID) | Docker Knowledge of code versioning with GIT, Github, GitLab Basic knowledge of React.js, Angular, NextJS, HTML, CSS, and JS.
About.p4: I have intermediate-level reading and conversational skills in English.

First.description: I work as a backend developer with technical leadership, defining architecture, SQL modeling, technology stack, and solution feasibility. I am responsible for leading the backend development of a patient management system and a patient medication prescription management system. I develop and evolve the inventory system using Python and Flask, and I initiated and lead the development of the internal system with Node.js and TypeScript. I structured the version control workflow using GitHub, adopting pull requests and code best practices. I implemented automations with n8n, WhatsApp, and OpenAI, focusing on integrations and database persistence. I configured VPS environments on Ubuntu and NGINX for application deployment. I worked on configuring the AWS environment with EC2, RDS (PostgreSQL), S3, and ECR, as well as CI/CD pipelines with GitHub Actions, automating build, deployment, and versioning. I am also responsible for translating requirements into tasks, organizing the workflow in Trello, reviewing pull requests, and mentoring the backend team.

Second.description: I worked as a developer using Node.js and JavaScript, with a focus on microservices architecture and message integration, as well as working with MySQL, Docker, AWS, and Linux. I contributed to the development and maintenance of REST APIs, creating new endpoints and features, as well as performing automated testing to ensure code quality. I was also responsible for debugging, optimizing processes, and managing integrations with AWS services, always aiming for continuous improvement and efficient solution delivery.

Third.description: I developed integrations between Node.js applications and Oracle services using Express and NestJS, optimizing data flow and communication between systems. I implemented secure and efficient RESTful APIs, following best development practices. I used Docker for deploying and managing applications, as well as MongoDB and PostgreSQL for data storage. I created unit tests with Jest and end-to-end tests to ensure the quality of functionalities. I automated the sending of personalized emails with Python and Pandas, eliminating manual processes and increasing the efficiency of marketing campaigns. In Salesforce, I developed e-commerce functionalities with Node.js, HTML, and CSS, improving customer experience and fixing bugs to ensure project stability.

First.title: Communication between Microservices.
First.description: Project for communication between Java and Node.js microservices

Second.title: Papelaria API
Second.description: E-commerce API built with NestJS, Postgres, and AWS S3

Third.title: SpotTube
Third.description: Playlist converter API from YouTube to Spotify

First.title: Scaling Node.js Applications with Clusters
First.description: The article discusses how to scale Node.js applications using the cluster module to improve performance and resource utilization of the server.

Second.title: Reverse Proxy: The Unsung Hero of the Web
Second.description: The article explains how reverse proxies optimize traffic distribution, security, and load balancing in web applications.

Third.title: Optimizing Node.js Performance with the Event Loop
Third.description: The article discusses how to optimize the performance of Node.js applications using the Event Loop.

Contact.h3: Currently, I am seeking new opportunities and my inbox is open.
